title: Finance/Revenue Operations Analyst - 12-month FTC
description:
Job Description

Who we’re looking for

We are looking for a motivated individual who will report to the Finance Revenue Operations Team Leader within the Finance department.

The Finance Revenue Operations Analyst is processing the Schroders Group gross revenue earned from client investments into pooled funds in the UK, Europe, APAC and the US. Pooled fund fees are charged directly in the fund accounts and generated either by third party providers or through Schroders’ process.

The Finance Revenue Operations Analyst also performs calculations, reconciliations, accounting and reporting of rebates due to intermediaries globally. Rebates are a form of discount typically of the management fees charged upfront in the pooled funds. The scale of the discount is determined in fee schedules which are part of the contractual arrangement that Schroders enters with its counterparties.

In the past 15 years, the Schroders Group Finance function has expanded the role of the Finance Operations team in Luxembourg, creating a global centre of competence for the processing and booking of fees earned from pooled funds, as well as rebates calculated and paid to intermediaries globally.

About Schroders

We’re a global investment manager. We help institutions, intermediaries and individuals around the world invest money to meet their goals, fulfil their ambitions, and prepare for the future.

We have around 6,000 people on six continents. And we’ve been around for over 200 years, but keep adapting to society and technology changes. What doesn’t change is our commitment to helping our clients, and society, prosper.

What You’ll Do


 * Collecting gross fund fee reports from fund administrators (directly or via internal parties); perform completeness checks and accounting recognition of the revenue numbers into various subsidiary books
 * Setting up and maintaining financial terms including client, product and payment details
 * Performing rebate calculations including reconciliations between client invoices and Schroders internal results
 * Performing monthly reconciliations between the rebates accrued and paid at a granular client level
 * Collaborate with finance, legal, product development, client services, etc. and various business owners on a broad range of initiatives
 * Provide analytical support for pricing and contract negotiations.
 * Answering internal/external queries arriving in the team’s mailbox
 * Providing informed statistics on volumes, complexity and effort
 * Maintaining accurate procedures whilst raising any issues to the line manager
   
   

The Knowledge, Experience And Qualifications You Need


 * Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Business Administration, Economics or Data Science
 * At least 2 years of similar or relevant experience is required
 * Excellent computer skills (advanced knowledge of MS Excel)
 * Very good English communication skills
   
   

The Knowledge, Experience And Qualifications That Will Help


 * Analytical and highly numerate
 * Ability to streamline functions
 * Fast learner who can implement system and process changes
   
   

What You’ll Be Like


 * You are driven, collaborative, able to deal with ambiguity
 * You are enthusiastic and emotionally resilient
   
   

We Recognise Potential, Whoever You Are

Our purpose is to provide excellent investment performance to clients through active management. Diversity of thought facilitated by an inclusive culture will allow us to make better decisions and better achieve our purpose. This is why inclusion and diversity are a strategic priority for us and why we are an equal opportunities employer: you are welcome here regardless of your age, disability, gender identity, religious beliefs, sexual orientation, socio-economic background or any other protected characteristics.

About Us

We're a global investment manager. We help institutions, intermediaries and individuals around the world invest money to meet their goals, fulfil their ambitions, and prepare for the future.

We have around 6,000 people on six continents. And we've been around for over 200 years, but keep adapting as society and technology changes. What doesn't change is our commitment to helping our clients, and society, prosper.
